resources.string: FAQ:1 What are the minimum qualifications of Undergraduate admission?
FAQ:2 Can I apply for Undergraduate program if I appeared in HSC?
FAQ:3 From where I can collect admission form?
FAQ:4 What is the admission fee?
FAQ:5 Which documents I must submit during admission?

string-array.name: group1
string-array.item: Ans: You have to pass SSC and HSC having atleast GPA 3.5 individually.

string-array.name: group2
string-array.item: Ans: If you have not passed HSC by the time the application period for the programme begins, you are required to submit an officially certified copy of your HSC admit card and registration card. Then you can sit for admission test. If you qualify in the Admission Test, you must have to submit the result of HSC exam. If your result are not published, you will not allowed to get the admission.

string-array.name: group3
string-array.item: Ans: Admission Form is available at the University website.You can apply online through website.

string-array.name: group4
string-array.item: Ans: Different Unibversities offer different fee structure.You can check it from respective university website.

string-array.name: group5
string-array.item: Ans: Photocopies with attestation of all certificates, marks sheet, testimonials,3 copies of recent passport size and 1 copy of stamp size photograph are required
